Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Ambassador Self Catering Apartments places you in the heart of Cape Town, minutes from Clifton Bay Beach and close to Table Mountain. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Lions Head and Maiden's Cove.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 28 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and microwaves.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Ambassador Self Catering Apartments places you in the heart of Cape Town, minutes from Clifton Bay Beach and close to Table Mountain. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Lions Head and Maiden's Cove.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Clifton Bay Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Lions Head - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Maiden's Cove - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Queens Beach - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Sea Point Swimming Pool - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Camps Bay Beach - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Sea Point Pavillion - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Milton Beach - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Theatre on the Bay - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Table Mountain Aerial Cableway - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Christopher Moller Art Gallery - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Signal Hill - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Cape Town Medi Clinic - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Bertram House - 3.3 km / 2 mi
De Waal Park - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for Ambassador Self Catering Apartments is Cape Town (CPT-Cape Town Intl.) - 20.6 km / 12.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
